titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the engrossment of H.R. 1319.
Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make a correction in the engrossment of H.R. 1319.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Budget, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on the Budget, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

vote.text: Passed/agreed to in House: Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 179, H. Res. 176 is considered passed House.
Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 179, H. Res. 176 is considered passed House.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This resolution directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make specified corrections in the engrossment of H.R. 1319 (American Rescue Plan Act of 2021).
